title: Souvlakia with tzatziki
description: A barbecue classic, or just an under-the-grill reminiscence of summer - your own homemade kebabs will knock their socks off.
ingredients: 1 kilo boneless pork or lamb (eg. leg fillet or steaks)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ cucumber, peeled and finely diced
1 tbsp white or red wine vinegar
salt and freshly ground black pepper
